sqlCreate: CREATE TABLE if not exists USER(NAME NVARCHAR2(32) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,WORD CHAR(32) NOT NULL) WITHOUT ROWID;
CREATE TABLE if not exists COLUMN(ID CHAR(32) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, PARENTID CHAR(32), TITLE NVARCHAR2(200), KIND NVARCHAR2(100), LINK NVARCHAR2(200) ) WITHOUT ROWID;

CREATE TABLE if not exists ARTICLE(ID CHAR(32) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, PARENTID CHAR(32) NOT NULL,KIND NVARCHAR2(100), TITLE NVARCHAR2(200),CONTENT NVARCHAR2(10000),VIDEOLINK NVARCHAR2(1000),IMGLINK NVARCHAR2(1000),RECNAME NVARCHAR2(20),RECTIME VARCHAR(20) ) WITHOUT ROWID;
CREATE INDEX if not exists [idx_article_id] ON [ARTICLE] ([ID] DESC);
CREATE INDEX if not exists [idx_article_parentid] ON [ARTICLE] ([PARENTID] DESC);
